meta.job_title: Asst. Director of Admission and Enrollment

duties_responsibilities.duty: Sets, communicates, and executes the overall admissions and enrollment strategy for the organization, including overseeing research, design, writing, and editing of all admission communications (digital and print) and promotional materials.
Analyzes and evaluates prospective students, conducts college visits, and interviews, counseling and advising students about all aspects of the study-away program.
Manages the CRM software, evaluates the admissions processes/practices and their relation to diversity, access, and supporting student success.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree with a minimum of 2 years relevant and/or transferable experience (Master's preferred)
